messages.content: What is the name of the store/site?
This is the ecommerce store/site named as "SecureWeb Store" and we sell products within the Country India only.
How long will it take to get my order?
We take approximately 3-4 Days to deliver any product to the customer's home.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept these payment methods to purchase the products: Google pay, Net banking, Paytm, By Cash
How can I track my order?

Once your order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email containing a tracking number. You can use this number to track your package through our website's tracking portal or the carrier's website.
What is your return policy?

We offer a hassle-free return policy within 15 days of delivery. Items must be in their original condition with tags attached for a full refund. Please refer to our Returns & Exchanges page for detailed instructions.
Do you offer international shipping?
No, don't ship products internationally. We only ship products within india only.
How can I contact customer support?
Our customer support team is available via email at securewebtechnologies@yopmail.com or through our live chat feature on the website. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
Are my personal and payment details secure on your website?
Yes, we take security seriously. Our website uses SSL encryption to protect your personal and payment information. Additionally, we do not store credit card details after the transaction is complete.
Can I cancel or modify my order after it has been placed?
We process orders quickly to ensure prompt delivery. If you need to cancel or modify your order, please contact us immediately. Once the order has been shipped, we cannot make changes.
Are the products on your website authentic?
Yes, we guarantee the authenticity of all the products we sell. We source our products directly from authorized distributors and manufacturers.
How do I know if an item is in stock?

Each product page displays real-time inventory status. If an item is out of stock, you can sign up to receive notifications when it becomes available again. Additionally, our customer support team can assist you in checking stock availability.
What countries do you ship to?
We ship products to only one country in the world that is India
What is the available time of your support?
Our support team is available from Monday to Friday from 9:30Am to 6:30Pm. You can contact anytime in this period of time.
Do you have any offline store as well?
Yes we also have offline store in the city mohali, Country India and the full address is: Sector 75, Mohali, India. You can react any time our offline store is open 24 hours.
In which country your store is located?
Our store is located in country india
Do you have hiring in your store?
Yes we are hiring for the door keeping boys and you can send us a message for hiring to the mail at : hiring.secureweb@yopmail.com
